scripts.install: npm install --prefix ./html && npm install --prefix ./react && npm install --prefix ./angular
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix ./html && npm run build --prefix ./react && npm run build --prefix ./angular
scripts.quickstart: npm run install && npm run build
scripts.update:cloudinary/base: npm install @cloudinary/base@latest --prefix ./html && npm install @cloudinary/base@latest --prefix ./react && npm install @cloudinary/base@latest --prefix ./angular && npm install @cloudinary/base@latest --prefix ./angular/projects/angular-library
